actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Each creature in contact with the ground within 15 feet of the clockwork must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Flare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak
name: Clockwork Bronze Scout [MoM]

specialTraits.description: The clockwork doesn't provoke opportunity attack when it burrows.
specialTraits.name: Earth Armor

specialTraits.description: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
